name: Grace Hopper: Bug Rescue
description:
Grace Hopper: Bug Rescue is currently in development, the current demo is available here. Please consider supporting the game by making a donation.

--

Grace Hopper: Bug Rescue is a Sokoban* style puzzle game about finding bugs (insects and coding errors) in the machine. 

In a computer science themed world along with famous characters as insects. Players will navigate by planning moves, sliding blocks, solving puzzles, rescuing their colleagues to get the insect computer up and running.

--

This game is aimed at 9+ (mainly for reading age), and is a fun puzzle game which hopefully will get you excited about computer science history and how computers work!

Please let us know what you think in the comments and follow developments on our instagram and twitter. 

https://www.tandc.games | twitter.com/TandCGames | instagram.com/tandcgames/
